title: The Strongest Qi Refiner - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Harem   Martial Arts   School Life
tags: Apathetic Protagonist   Average-looking Protagonist   Calm Protagonist   Cold Protagonist   Immortals   Loner Protagonist   Low-key Protagonist   Male Protagonist   Mature Protagonist   Medical Knowledge   Overpowered Protagonist   Past Plays a Big Role   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Ruthless Protagonist
author: Lee Daoran
description: Fang Yu, who has practiced for nearly five thousand years, still hasn’t broken through the key refining period… Now its the modern period in earth. “I might be in the key refining period but you don’t want to mess with me”.>
